dict.string: Download your Facebook friends to the Contacts app and keep their information up to date.
Enable apps to work with your Facebook account, with your permission.
Download your Facebook events to the Calendar app and keep them up to date.
In Settings you can disable Contacts and Calendar syncing, and disallow an app on this device from accessing your Facebook account.
• Approve or deny the request. • Review Facebook's description of what information the app is requesting. • Control who can see Facebook posts by the app.
In addition, when each app asks for permission to use your account, you can:
Allow you to post status updates, photos, and other content to Facebook.
